name: Ruchi Puffed Rice (Muri)
description:
Ruchi Puffed Rice (Muri) is a light and crispy snack made from high-quality rice, puffed to perfection. It is a versatile food item, popular in traditional Bangladeshi and South Asian cuisine. name: Brown Bread
description:

name: Bread Pit Sugar Free Bread Special
description:
This 400 gm loaf of sugar-free bread is a smart, delicious choice for those who prioritize health without compromising taste. Product Features:1. Low Starch, High Protein: Specially formulated for a balanced nutritional profile, perfect for those monitoring carbohydrate intake.2. No Added Sugar: Completely free from added sugars, making it a great choice for individuals managing diabetes or following a low-sugar diet.3. Health-Friendly: Designed with health-conscious consumers in mind, offering a wholesome alternative to traditional bread. Key Benefits:1. Supports healthy blood sugar levels and weight management.2. Provides a nutritious option for breakfast, sandwiches, or snacks.3. Suitable for individuals with dietary restrictions, including diabetics and those on high-protein or low-carb diets.

name: Ispahani Bakery Fresh Dry Cake
description:
Ispahani Bakery Fresh Dry Cake (300 gm) is a delightful treat perfect for any occasion. Soft, moist, and bursting with flavor, this cake is crafted from high-quality ingredients, ensuring a rich taste in every bite. Ideal for pairing with tea or coffee, it’s perfect for sharing with friends and family or enjoying as a personal indulgence. Experience the goodness of Ispahani’s expertise in baking with this deliciously satisfying cake!

name: Bread Pit Multigrain Bread
description:
Super seeded multigrain bread. Has a delicious taste with all the health benefits. Contains whole grain flour and mixed seeds including sunflower, pumpkin and sesame seeds and flaxseed. Has high dietary fibre which can help to reduce cholesterol,  blood pressure and aid digestion.

name: Farmer's Gold Red Flattened Rice (Lal Chira)
description:
The benefits of eating chira cannot be over stated. There is no limit to the number of ways in which Chira can be eaten in hot, breakfast, afternoon meals, with yoghurt and mango. Chira is of immense importance in cooling the stomach, filling the dehydration and at the same time satisfying the hunger.

name: Ifad Puffed Rice
description:
Puffed Rice always has been a part of Bengali Culture. It is said to be a magical item, that indulges with evening snacks. IFAD puffed rice is crispy and uniform in shape. With no urea added in IFAD puffed rice, it is safe & tasty puffed rice that goes best in ‘JHAL MURI’, evening snacks & Ramadhan.
